Image & Visual Tools.title: Google Image Generation

Image & Visual Tools.title: Flux Pro Ultra Image Generation

Image & Visual Tools.title: IdeogramV2 Image Generation
Image & Visual Tools.description: Generates images using the Ideogram v2a model, known for better text accuracy. Supports various styles and aspect ratios.

Image & Visual Tools.title: Vector Artist
Image & Visual Tools.description: Generates a vector image (SVG format) from a text description using the Fal AI Recraft v3 model. Ideal for creating illustrations, line art, icons, and other vector graphics. Offers control over aspect ratio, various style presets (e.g., bold stroke, contour pop art, engraving), and optional seed for reproducibility.

Image & Visual Tools.title: Digital Illustrator
Image & Visual Tools.description: Generates digital illustrations (JPEG or PNG format) in a versatile digital art style using the Fal AI Recraft v3 model. Takes a text prompt as input and allows control over aspect ratio, output format (jpeg/png), and optional seed for reproducibility. Ideal for creating general digital artwork based on descriptions.

Image & Visual Tools.title: FluxDev Image Generation
Image & Visual Tools.description: High-quality image generation using Fal AI's FluxDev model, capable of creating detailed, photorealistic images from text prompts with customizable aspect ratios and output formats
